parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to be returned. You can use this parameter together with NextToken.

Valid values: 1 to 500.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Set the value to the NextToken value returned in the previous call to the DescribeDiskReplicaPairs operation. Leave this parameter empty the first time you call this operation. When you specify NextToken, the PageSize and PageNumber request parameters do not take effect and the TotalCount response parameter is invalid.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: PairId
parameters.description: The ID of the replication pair. You can call the [DescribeDiskReplicaPairs](~~354206~~) operation to query a list of asynchronous replication pairs, including replication pair IDs.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the primary or secondary disk in the async replication pair. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~354276~~) operation to query the most recent list of regions in which async replication is supported.
